dependencies.description:
CFITSIO is a library of C and Fortran subroutines for reading and
writing data files in FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) data
format.
dependencies.name: cfitsio

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Libsharp is a code library for spherical harmonic transforms (SHTs) and
spin-weighted spherical harmonic transforms, which evolved from the
libpsht library.
dependencies.name: libsharp

dependent_to.description: healpy is a Python package to handle pixelated data on the sphere.
dependent_to.name: py-healpy

description:
Healpix-CXX is a C/C++ library for calculating Hierarchical Equal Area
isoLatitude Pixelation of a sphere.
name: healpix-cxx

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
